name: ldpc-js
description: Javascript implementation of Low-parity density codes (for education purposes).

scripts.setup-esformatter: npm install esformatter esformatter-align esformatter-asi esformatter-braces esformatter-collapse-objects esformatter-dot-notation esformatter-flow esformatter-jsx esformatter-limit-linebreaks esformatter-literal-notation esformatter-parseint esformatter-quote-props esformatter-quotes esformatter-remove-trailing-commas esformatter-spaced-lined-comment esformatter-var-each

author: Botezatu Mihai Catalin
